gobblin.restli.throttling

Interface LeaderFinder<T extends LeaderFinder.Metadata>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZookeeperLeaderElection

    public interface LeaderFinder<T extends LeaderFinder.Metadata>
extends Service
    An interface to find the leader in a cluster of processes. Multiple processes that instantiate equivalent LeaderFinders automatically elect a single leader at all times. Each process can verify whether it is the leader using isLeader(), and it can obtain the metadata of the current leader using getLeaderMetadata(). The metadata is application specific, but it might include the URI of the leader for example.

    • Nested Class Summary
